ygData.subject: Re: rumors
ygData.msgSnippet: I agree with that, i dont even use melee anymore... Wes Lobdell, Quote: +ACI-Hide not your Talents+ADs- they for Use were made. What s a Sundial in the
ygData.messageBody:
I agree with that, i dont even use melee anymore...

Wes Lobdell,
Quote: +ACI-Hide not your Talents+ADs- they for Use were made. What's a Sundial in the Shade?+ACI-
Benjamin Franklin

First they are two different styles of weapon but the Observer staff is much more deadly, not in melee power but at level 30 (or thereabouts) when you can get either staff the Observer staff adds 60 mana with bonus mana and bonus intelligence and it only goes up with levels. Just one more thing personally I would rather carry a Black Tome with Silver Runes and a Glowing Black Stone at that level......

Tome
Mana
Intelligence

Stone
Intelligence
Save Magic

That would be around 120 extra mana at level 30. I will let the tanks hit, I rather have a few +ACI-roots+ACI- left in me then rather to be able to hope to get good shot in with mobs that hit for 100 points of dmg.
